title: BOAT Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Lower Division Clerk Post
description: Board of Apprenticeship Training Western Region (BOAT WR) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for various Lower Division Clerk Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the BOAT Notification 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last date ...
